item.title: Address Relay
item.description: Speaker 0: 00:00:00 In Adromain you also have this distinction between the new and the tried tables. So the new tables are for unverified addresses that someone just sent you and you don’t know whether they are good, whether there’s really a Bitcoin node behind them. And the tried table is addresses that you’ve been connected to in the past. So at some point, at least in the past, you know, they were your peers at some point.
